trips.name: Bali Adventure
trips.description: Explore Bali's beaches, temples, and culture with exciting activities.
trips.details: This Bali package includes 5 nights stay, airport transfers, guided tours, and adventure sports like paragliding. You'll also enjoy local cuisine, cultural performances, and sunset cruises.

trips.name: Swiss Alps
trips.description: Snow-capped mountains, scenic train rides, and cozy stays.
trips.details: Enjoy 7 days in the Swiss Alps with luxury stays, ski passes, and guided mountain tours. Includes scenic Glacier Express train ride, hot springs, and authentic Swiss dining.

trips.name: Dubai Luxury Tour
trips.description: Desert safaris, luxury shopping, and modern marvels.
trips.details: This 4-night Dubai tour includes desert safari, city tour, Burj Khalifa tickets, premium accommodation, and a dhow cruise dinner.

trips.name: Tokyo Explorer
trips.description: A perfect blend of tradition and technology in the heart of Japan.
trips.details: Spend 6 days in Tokyo visiting historic temples, enjoying sushi workshops, and riding the famous bullet train to nearby cities.

trips.name: Santorini Escape
trips.description: Romantic sunsets, whitewashed houses, and the deep blue sea.
trips.details: Experience 5 nights in Santorini with sea-view accommodation, wine tasting tours, and a sunset cruise to Oia.

trips.name: New York City Lights
trips.description: The city that never sleeps with endless attractions.
trips.details: Enjoy 5 days in NYC with visits to Times Square, Broadway shows, Statue of Liberty, and top shopping districts.
